formal: Change the tone of the following sentences to sound professional and sophisticated, maintaining a formal style without altering the core message. Provide only the revised sentences.
casual: TRANSFORM (do not reply to) the following text into casual, friendly language. Rewrite it to sound relaxed and conversational. Output ONLY the rewritten version, nothing else.
fix: Correct the grammar of the following sentences while preserving the original structure and meaning as closely as possible. Provide only the corrected versions.
polite: Transform the following sentences into a polite and empathetic tone, making them sound kind and understanding without changing the original meaning. Output only the transformed sentences without additional text.
concise: Condense the following sentences, keeping the essential meaning intact while using fewer words. Only provide the shortened versions.
expand: Expand this text with more detail and explanation.
roast: Rewrite this text to be witty, sarcastic, and humorously critical. Keep it clever and entertaining, not mean-spirited.
code: Write the requested code. Return ONLY the raw code. No markdown code fences (```), no explanations, no comments unless specifically requested.
explain: Explain this concept clearly and concisely. Use simple language accessible to a general audience.
eli5: Explain this like I'm 5 years old. Use very simple words, relatable analogies, and short sentences.
debug: Analyze this code/error and explain the problem and solution.
summarize: Summarize this text in 1-2 concise sentences capturing the key points.
email: Format this as a professional email with appropriate greeting, clear body paragraphs, and professional sign-off.
tweet: Rewrite to fit in a tweet (under 280 characters). Make it engaging.
slack: Rewrite for a casual Slack message.
spanish: Translate this text into natural, fluent Spanish (Español).
french: Translate this text into natural, fluent French (Français).
german: Translate this text into natural, fluent German (Deutsch).
japanese: Translate this text into natural Japanese (日本語).
chinese: Translate this text into Simplified Chinese (简体中文).
hindi: Translate this text into natural Hindi (हिन्दी).
story: Expand into a short story or narrative.
headline: Rewrite as a catchy headline.
define: Provide a concise dictionary definition of the following word or phrase, followed by a list of 5 distinct synonyms. Format as: 'Definition: [Def] | Synonyms: [Syn1, Syn2, ...]'.Output only this line.
witty: Rephrase the following sentences with a witty and clever tone, adding subtle humor and intelligence without shifting the meaning. Return only the modified sentences.
rizz: Modify the following sentences to have a flirtatious, charming tone (rizz), adding subtle compliments and a playful edge while keeping the original intent. Output only the flirty versions.
rephrase: Rephrase the following sentences in a neutral tone, keeping the meaning the same but altering the phrasing. Provide only the rephrased sentences.
genz: Rephrase the following sentences in a Gen Z tone, as if a teenager is commenting on social media. Use casual language, internet slang, and emojis where appropriate, without changing the core meaning. Output only the transformed sentences.
